name: Wizard's Journey
description:
The first BETA version of my first RPG, game is not even 20% complete, however you can still roam around the world of Wicarewyn, explore the demo enviroment and the graves. 

More things are coming, I have just started working on the project, but I decided to post it here and develop the game with the help of my followers (if any).

Donations are not required, but very much appreciated and will support me continue the development of the game.
